useCases.title: P0 bug triage to patch
useCases.description: When production regressions hit, trigger a focused fix directly from the incident issue and get a reviewable PR without context switching tools.
useCases.example: @porter opencode reproduce and patch oauth callback mismatch from logs in issue body

useCases.title: Cross-file refactor execution
useCases.description: Use issue-scoped plans to drive larger architecture cleanups while preserving one auditable thread from request to merged code.
useCases.example: @porter claude migrate legacy REST handlers to shared service layer and preserve existing contracts

useCases.title: Coverage hardening before release
useCases.description: Generate targeted unit and integration tests around risky code paths before cutover windows or major dependency upgrades.
useCases.example: @porter amp add tests for checkout retry, timeout fallback, and webhook signature edge cases

useCases.title: Dependency and platform upgrades
useCases.description: Automate framework and package migrations with explicit acceptance criteria in the issue to reduce manual upgrade toil.
useCases.example: @porter opencode upgrade to react 19, replace deprecated APIs, and include migration notes in PR
